QuestData.Title: One Last Delivery
QuestData.Description: That's it then. With the last of the ore you salvaged we now have enough to send to Valiance Keep.$B$BIf Farshire is wiped off the face of Azeroth, then at least let us be remembered as the first ones to defend our land and the last ones to give up.$B$BTake this ore to Hilda Stoneforge - she is a good friend of mine. Tell her to make some good weapons with this ore. We'll need plenty of them in the days to come.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Crate of Farshire Ore to Hilda Stoneforge in Valiance Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: Ore from Farshire? We weren't scheduled for a shipment just yet. Is something wrong?
